message.content:
Based on the given lineage relationships, Scott and Terry both have Kenneth as a common ancestor. Scott is a descendant of Kenneth through the chain: Kenneth → Alan → Thomas → Frances → Donna → Bobby → Sharon → Billy → Jessica → Willie → Henry → Rebecca → Michael → Scott. Terry is a descendant of Kenneth through the chain: Kenneth → Justin → Mark → Austin → Mary → Paul → Samantha → Carol → Raymond → Jerry → Christian → Bradley → Lori → Gary → Walter → Philip → Sandra → Sara → Marilyn → Tyler → Emily → Timothy → Shirley → Adam → Amanda → Eugene → Diana → Joe → Benjamin → Charles → Katherine → Hannah → Janice → Abigail → Deborah → Jordan → Jacqueline → Mason → Anthony → Kayla → Jeffrey → Noah → Nancy → Logan → Ann → Gregory → Gerald → Jacob → Patricia → Jeremy → John → Lauren → Judith → Brandon → Natalie → Brian → Madison → Kelly → Theresa → George → Doris → Joan → Alexander → Michelle → Kathryn → Bruce → Joseph → Jean → Frank → Christina → Joshua → Wayne → Julia → Nicole → Catherine → Steven → Pamela → Ryan → Cynthia → Carl → Isabella → Cheryl → Russell → Patrick → Zachary → Roy → Megan → Anna → Elijah → Dennis → Charlotte → Heather → Andrew → Nicholas → William → Lisa → Randy → Jennifer → Brittany → Amber → Sean → Vincent → Susan → Harold → Laura → Albert → Linda → Samuel → Kyle → Stephen → Olivia → Virginia → Denise → Martha → Terry. Thus, Scott and Terry share a common ancestor, Kenneth.

<ANSWER>1</ANSWER>
